title: Pancakes with Maple Syrup
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk in milk, egg and melted butter until smooth. Cook on a hot pan 2-3 min per side. Serve with maple syrup.

title: Omelette with Veggies
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Sauté veggies in oil, pour eggs over, cook until set. Fold and serve.

title: French Toast Delight
instructions: Whisk egg, milk and sugar. Dip bread and fry in butter until golden. Dust with powdered sugar and serve.

title: Healthy Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Pour into a glass and enjoy chilled.

title: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper. Grill skin-side down 4-5 min, flip 2-3 min. Squeeze lemon and serve.

title: Steak with Vegetables
instructions: Season steak. Sear in hot pan 3-4 min per side for medium. Serve with sauteed vegetables.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Make tomato-onion gravy, add spices, cubes of paneer, simmer with butter and cream for 5 minutes. Serve hot with naan.

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Make sauce with cream, garlic and parmesan. Toss pasta and chicken in sauce until coated.

title: Grilled Chicken with Rice
instructions: Marinate chicken and grill until cooked. Cook rice separately. Serve chicken over rice with salad.

title: Veggie Wrap
instructions: Spread hummus on tortilla, add veggies and cheese, roll tightly and slice in half.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Sauté onion and garlic, add beef and sauce, simmer 15 min. Serve over spaghetti.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce, croutons and parmesan with dressing. Top with sliced chicken if desired.

title: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté vegetables with garlic, toss with pasta and parmesan. Serve warm.

title: Avocado Salad
instructions: Chop avocado and tomato. Toss with lettuce, olive oil, lemon juice and salt.

title: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt. Layer partially cooked rice and chicken, cook on low heat until done.

title: Special Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on base, add cheese and toppings. Bake in hot oven 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.

title: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Mix dry and wet ingredients separately then combine. Bake at 180°C for 25-30 minutes. Cool and serve.

title: Halwa Puri
instructions: Prepare halwa by roasting semolina in ghee, add sugar and water until thick. Make puri dough, roll and deep fry until puffed.
